description: Stylesheet for managing themes and styling of the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container for the Tic Tac Toe game with theme-dependent styles.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the application, including its animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, designed to support a flexible layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
